Name: Transmitter Hunt
Descriptions: Power up your receivers, solve the puzzles and hunt down the transmitter of transmitters
Rules: Three or four members are allowed per team
Each team should bring atleast one smartphone
Each team should bring atleast one smartphone with Internet connectivity and any QR Code reader application
The decisions of all Officials regarding these rules and the conduct of the event shall be final

Any deviation from the mentioned rules will disqaulify the team

Event Structure :

Stage 1 : Written Test

Rest your brawns and test your brains. Three lies covers a truth. The more you know, the better off will you be

Stage 2 : Circuit Assembly

Traces of copper never fades in our minds. Gather the right parts. Breath life into what you just saw

Stage 3 : Find the fox
Power up your receivers, solve the puzzles, and hunt down the transmitter of transmitters. Be sure to bring back the fox.
